content.raw:
the rotors_motor_model_debug branch has a full copy of the model (instead of `<include>`) with the plugins added

* #!/ignitionrobotics/ign-gazebo/branch/rotors_motor_model_debug?dest=rotors_motor_model#diff

the plugin currently sends hard-coded motor commands to every rotor and it flies upward. we will need to test with a real controller to fully test the math
